data.title: Welcome to The House of Fame!

entries.title: The Beginning
entries.caption: And so it all begins, a fateful day in The House of Fame! Six hopefuls were handpicked to embark on a quest for global stardom. Nestled in Del Sol Valley, on a sprawling 64x64 lot, our sims will compete to become a global superstar. The first to reach 5-star celebrity status will claim the ultimate prize!

entries.title: The Creative Circle
entries.caption: The cast will be spending most of their time honing their craft in the the creative circle. Each sim has an object tied to their path to fame. They all have a different skill they will focus on to aquire fame. Curious to know more about our cast? Dive into the cast section for the full scoop!

entries.title: The First Night
entries.caption: On the first night, action unfolds in the creative circle. New friendships blossom and drama brews. Keep an eye on Eloise and Sage, who are growing closer by the day, despite both being married. Will their secret affair be exposed? Or will they manage to keep it under wraps? Only time will tell!

entries.title: Painting the Town
entries.caption: The second day arrives, and the contestants are primed for their journey. But as night falls, Cassandra stumbles upon Eloise and Sage's secret rendezvous in the creative circle. Seizing the moment, she immortalizes their affair in a scandalous painting, earning fame points aplenty. But trouble brews as Nathaniel learns the truth and delivers a fiery slap to Eloise!

entries.title: Celebrity Sighting
entries.caption: As dawn breaks, Gavin hits the town and finds himself in the company of A-lister Thorne Blackwood. A simple photo request turns into a thrilling invitation to share the stage. With this unexpected turn, Gavin inches closer to Cassandra in the fame race. The competition's heating up, and the rest of the house better keep pace if they aim to claim the ultimate prize!

entries.title: Cassandra's Star
entries.caption: Cassandra paints her first masterpiece and earns a fame star for her work. It depicts the human form in all of its beauty. Her goal is to improve body acceptance through art. She's off to a strong start with this piece!

entries.title: Nathaniel's Novels
entries.caption: Despite the drama with Eloise, Nathaniel is hard at work on his latest novel. He's determined to make a name for himself in the literary world. He earns a fame star from the series of childrens novels he publishes about a two finned shark.

entries.title: Gavin's Music
entries.caption: At work, Gavin is faced with a challenge decision to shut down a show or play an encore. The ban was supposed to stop playing at midnight, but the crowd is having such a good time. He plays an encore and earns a fame star from how the crowd raves about his performance.

entries.title: Eloise's Makeover
entries.caption: Eloise goes on set to get into hair and makeup. She tells the stylists she wants a new look. Something that will make people take her more seriously in the competition. Eloise sits back and trusts the stylists.

entries.title: Eloise's Star
entries.caption: The stylists give Eloise a more edgy look to embrace her villain status on the show. She earns a fame star for the polarizing reactions she gets to her new look. Eloise's new look is all fashion magazines can talk about. She's ready to take on the competition with her new style.

entries.title: Gavin's Music
entries.caption: Gavin learns the secret to getting his music out into the world - the internet. He streams his new songs to thousands of fans and earns a fame star for his online presence. Gavin's music is taking the world by storm!

entries.title: Jasper v. Sage
entries.caption: With all of the other contestants at one star, Jasper and Sage are up for elimination. Ultimately, Jasper has more followers from streaming his workout routines. Sage is eliminated from the competition.

entries.title: Sage Eliminated
entries.caption: Sage screams obscenities at the cast as he leaves the house. He's not happy about being eliminated. He's swears once he gets home he'll make a comeback and show the world what he's made of.

entries.title: Jasper's First Star
entries.caption: Jasper posts his new workout regimine and mealplan online. Sims see success in their overall welness journey from following his plan. It goes viral online and he earns his first fame star. Jasper is on his way to becoming a global superstar!

entries.title: Cassandra's Masterpiece
entries.caption: Cassandra decides to continue her series of paintings. She paints another masterpiece depicting the human form. This time, she adds a twist by painting the human form based on one of her castmastes, Nathaniel.

entries.title: The Kiss
entries.caption: Jasper has been training Gavin in fitness and the two have gotten awfully close. Jasper feels a connection with Gavin and decides to make a move. He leans in and kisses Gavin. Sparks fly. The tabloids cant stop talking about the new couple. Jasper earns a fame star for his new relationship.

entries.title: The Divorce
entries.caption: Nathaniel serves Eloise with divorce papers. She is so angry with him they get into a screaming match. His neck contorts from the anger. Eloise storms off and refuses to sign the papers.

entries.title: Why I Did It
entries.caption: Fueled by anger, Eloise makes a tearful vlog apologizing to her follows for her actions. But her apology comes across as fake and she loses followers for her insincerity. Eloise loses a fame star for her actions.

entries.title: One Last Try
entries.caption: Eloise sits next to the cast that is safe. She pretends not to know she is up for elimination. Despite her acting skills, the crew doesn't buy her story. Production tells Eloise to stand next to Nathaniel for elimination.

entries.title: A Tearful Goodbye
entries.caption: Eloise is eliminated from the competition. She cries as she leaves the house. She's sad to leave the competition, but she's ready to start fresh. Eloise is determined to make a comeback and show the world what she's made of.
